means: 做得成的，可完成的，可有成就的

sentence.Network_en: Is full employment any longer achievable?
sentence.Network_cn: 充分就业还有可能实现吗？

sentence.Network_en: Understanding these rare molecules will help chemists to find out what is achievable.
sentence.Network_cn: 了解这些稀有分子能帮助化学家找到可实现的目标。

entry.def: If you say that something you are trying to do is achievable, you mean that it is possible for you to succeed in doing it.

example.ex: It is often a good idea to start with smaller, easily achievable goals.
example.tran: 一开始把目标定得低一点、容易实现一点，总不失为一个好主意。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of existing or taking place or proving true; possible to do

auth_sentence.content: I do not believe this is achievable at all.
auth_sentence.res_content: I do not believe this is achievable at all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I do not believe this is achievable at all.

auth_sentence.content: There is no better one, more achievable one.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no better one, more achievable one.

auth_sentence.content: I think that starting my own business is achievable.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think that starting my own business is achievable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think that starting my own business is achievable.
